00044   v1724_exit,             // exit

00060 typedef struct s_v1724_odb

00083 #define S_V1724_ODB_STR "\
00084 [.]\n\
00085 VME base = DWORD : 0x32100000\n\
00086 enabled = BOOL : y\n\
00087 waveform length = DWORD : 32\n\
00088 acquisition mode = BYTE : 1\n\
00089 software trigger mode = BYTE : 0\n\
00090 hardware trigger mode = BYTE : 0\n\
00091 trigger edge (0-ris 1-fal) = BYTE : 1\n\
00092 down sampling factor = INT : 1\n\
00093 ROC firmware = STRING : [128] -\n\
00094 AMC firmware = STRING : [128] -\n\
00095 \n\
00096 [Ch0]\n\
00097 enabled = BOOL : y\n\
00098 DC offset = DWORD : 0\n\
00099 self-trigger mode = BYTE : 0\n\
00100 trigger threshhold = DWORD : 0\n\
00101 \n\
00102 [Ch1]\n\
00103 enabled = BOOL : y\n\
00104 DC offset = DWORD : 0\n\
00105 self-trigger mode = BYTE : 1\n\
00106 trigger threshhold = DWORD : 0\n\
00107 \n\
00108 [Ch2]\n\
00109 enabled = BOOL : y\n\
00110 DC offset = DWORD : 0\n\

00113 \n\

00145 INT v1724_init()
00146 {
00147   
00148   /* ODB */
00149   char str[1024];
00150   HNDLE hKey;
00151   for (int iboard=0; iboard<NBOARDS; iboard++)
00152     {
00153       sprintf(str,"/Equipment/Crate %i/Settings/CAEN%i",crate_number,iboard);
00154       int status = db_check_record(hDB,0,str,S_V1724_ODB_STR,FALSE);
00155       if(status==DB_NO_KEY || status==DB_STRUCT_MISMATCH)
00156         {
00157           status = db_create_record(hDB,0,str,S_V1724_ODB_STR);
00158           printf("Creating key with status: %d \n",status);
00159         }
00160       else if (status==DB_INVALID_HANDLE)
00161         {
00162           printf("Error: Cannot connect to database to setup CAEN V1724");
00163           return FE_ERR_HW;
00164         }
00165 
00166 
00167       status = db_find_key(hDB,0,str,&hKey);
00168       status = db_open_record(hDB, hKey, &(S_V1724_ODB[iboard]), sizeof(S_V1724_ODB[0]), MODE_READ, NULL, NULL);
00169     }
00170 
00171   printf("Opening CAEN VME interface ...");
00172   fflush(stdout);
00173 
00174   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00175   CAEN_DGTZ_BoardInfo_t BoardInfo[NBOARDS];
00176   uint32_t data;
00177 
00178   for (int iboard=0; iboard<NBOARDS; iboard++)
00179     {
00180       
00181       if ( !S_V1724_ODB[iboard].enabled ) continue;
00182 
00183 #if 0
00184       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_OpenDigitizer(CAEN_DGTZ_USB,0,0,S_V1724_ODB[iboard].vme_base,&handle[iboard]);
00185 #else
00186       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_OpenDigitizer(CAEN_DGTZ_PCIE_OpticalLink,0,0,S_V1724_ODB[iboard].vme_base,&handle[iboard]);
00187 #endif
00188       if(ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success) 
00189         {
00190           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Can't open digitizer at address 0x%08x\n",S_V1724_ODB[iboard].vme_base);
00191           return FE_ERR_HW;
00192         }
00193 
00194       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_GetInfo(handle[iboard], &(BoardInfo[iboard]));
00195       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00196         {
00197           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot get board info. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00198           return FE_ERR_HW;
00199         }
00200       printf("\nConnected to CAEN Digitizer Model %s, recognized as board %d\n", BoardInfo[iboard].ModelName, iboard);
00201       printf("\tROC FPGA Release is %s\n", BoardInfo[iboard].ROC_FirmwareRel);
00202       printf("\tAMC FPGA Release is %s\n", BoardInfo[iboard].AMC_FirmwareRel);
00203 
00204       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_Reset(handle[iboard]);                                               /* Reset Digitizer */
00205       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00206         {
00207           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot reset the board. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00208           return FE_ERR_HW;
00209         }
00210 
00211       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_GetInfo(handle[iboard], &(BoardInfo[iboard]));
00212       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00213         {
00214           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot get board info. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00215           return FE_ERR_HW;
00216         }
00217 
00218 
00219       // =====================================================================================
00220       // Setup 1024 data buffers (max.)
00221       // =====================================================================================
00222       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_WriteRegister(handle[iboard], 0x800C, 0xA);
00223       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00224         {
00225           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot configure data buffers. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00226           return FE_ERR_HW;
00227         }
00228 
00229 
00230       // =====================================================================================
00231       // Configure max. number of buffers for BLT readout
00232       // =====================================================================================
00233       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetMaxNumEventsBLT(handle[iboard],1024); 
00234       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00235         {
00236           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot configure data buffers for BLT readout. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00237           return FE_ERR_HW;
00238         }
00239 
00240       // =====================================================================================
00241       // Allocate memory buffer to hold data received from digitizer
00242       // =====================================================================================
00243       caen_data_buffer[iboard] = NULL;
00244       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_MallocReadoutBuffer(handle[iboard], &(caen_data_buffer[iboard]), &(caen_data_buffer_size[iboard]));  
00245       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00246         {
00247           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot MallocReadoutBuffer. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00248           return FE_ERR_HW;
00249         }
00250       printf("Readout buffer size: %i\n",caen_data_buffer_size[iboard]);
00251 
00252 
00253       // =====================================================================================
00254       // Allocate memory buffer to hold all data from digitizer
00255       // =====================================================================================
00256       data_buffer_size[iboard] = 0x2000000; // 32 MB
00257       data_buffer[iboard] = (char*)malloc(data_buffer_size[iboard]);
00258       if ( !data_buffer[iboard] )
00259         {
00260           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot allocate memory for data buffers.\n");
00261           return FE_ERR_HW;
00262         }
00263 
00264 #if 0            
00265       // PW
00266       uint32_t mydata;
00267       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle[iboard], 0x8100, &mydata);
00268       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00269         {
00270           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot read register 0x8100. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00271           return FE_ERR_HW;
00272         }
00273       printf("Acquisition control register is: %d\n", mydata);

00275       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_WriteRegister(handle[iboard], 0x8100, mydata);
00276       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00277         {
00278           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot write register 0x8100. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00279           return FE_ERR_HW;
00280         }
00281       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle[iboard], 0x8100, &mydata);
00282       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00283         {
00284           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot read register 0x8100. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00285           return FE_ERR_HW;
00286         }
00287       printf("2nd time Acquisition control register is: %d\n", mydata);
00288      
00289       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_DOWNSAMPLE_FACT_ADD, &mydata);
00290       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00291         {
00292           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot read register 0x%04x. Error 0x%08x\n",CAEN_DGTZ_DOWNSAMPLE_FACT_ADD, ret);
00293           return FE_ERR_HW;
00294         }
00295       printf("The down sampling factor currently is: 0x%08x\n", mydata);
00296       mydata = 10;
00297       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_WriteRegister(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_DOWNSAMPLE_FACT_ADD, mydata);
00298       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00299         {
00300           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot write register 0x8128. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00301           return FE_ERR_HW;
00302         }
00303       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_DOWNSAMPLE_FACT_ADD, &mydata);
00304       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00305         {
00306           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","2: Cannot read register 0x%04x. Error 0x%08x\n", CAEN_DGTZ_DOWNSAMPLE_FACT_ADD,ret);
00307           return FE_ERR_HW;
00308         }
00309       printf("The down sampling factor currently is: 0x%08x\n", mydata);
00310       // end PW
00311 #endif
00312 
00313     }
00314 
00315   printf("  [done]\n");
00316 
00317   return SUCCESS;
00318 }
00319 
00320 void v1724_exit()
00321 {
00322 
00323   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00324   for (int iboard=0; iboard<NBOARDS; iboard++)
00325     {
00326 
00327       if ( !S_V1724_ODB[iboard].enabled ) continue;
00328 
00329       // =====================================================================================
00330       // Free memory allocated for data buffer
00331       // =====================================================================================
00332       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_FreeReadoutBuffer(&(caen_data_buffer[iboard]));  
00333       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00334         {
00335           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_exit","Cannot FreeReadoutBuffer. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00336         }
00337 
00338       // =====================================================================================
00339       // Close digitizer
00340       // =====================================================================================
00341       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_CloseDigitizer(handle[iboard]);
00342       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00343         {
00344           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_exit","Cannot CloseDigitizer. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00345         }
00346 
00347       // =====================================================================================
00348       // Free memory buffers
00349       // =====================================================================================
00350       free( data_buffer[iboard] );      
00351     }
00352 }
00353 
00354 INT v1724_pre_bor()
00355 {
00356 
00357   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00358   for (int iboard=0; iboard<NBOARDS; iboard++)
00359     { 
00360       
00361       if ( !S_V1724_ODB[iboard].enabled ) continue;
00362 
00363       // ==========================================================================================
00364       // Reset digitizer
00365       // ==========================================================================================
00366       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_Reset(handle[iboard]);                                               /* Reset Digitizer */
00367       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00368         {
00369           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot reset the board. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00370           return FE_ERR_HW;
00371         }
00372 
00373       // =====================================================================================
00374       // Enable channels
00375       // =====================================================================================
00376       uint32_t channel_mask = 0x0; // disable all channels
00377       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00378         {
00379           if ( S_V1724_ODB[iboard].ch[ichan].enabled ) 
00380             channel_mask |= (1 << ichan); // enable channel ichannel
00381         }
00382       printf("channel enable mask: 0x%08x\n",channel_mask);
00383       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelEnableMask(handle[iboard],channel_mask);  // enable all channels
00384       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00385         {
00386           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot Enable channels. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00387           return FE_ERR_HW;
00388         }
00389       
00390       // =====================================================================================
00391       // Acquisition control
00392       // =====================================================================================
00393       //ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetAcquisitionMode(handle[iboard],CAEN_DGTZ_S_IN_CONTROLLED); 
00394       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetAcquisitionMode(handle[iboard], (CAEN_DGTZ_AcqMode_t)S_V1724_ODB[iboard].acquisition_mode); 
00395       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00396         {
00397           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot configure Acquisition Control. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00398           return FE_ERR_HW;
00399         }
00400       
00401 
00402     
00403       // =====================================================================================
00404       // Record length
00405       // =====================================================================================
00406       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetRecordLength(handle[iboard], S_V1724_ODB[iboard].wf_length);
00407       //ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetRecordLength(handle[iboard], 4096);
00408       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00409         {
00410           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetRecordLength. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00411           return FE_ERR_HW;
00412         }
00413 
00414       // =====================================================================================
00415       // Self-trigger mode
00416       // =====================================================================================
00417       
00418       // CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_DISABLED
00419       uint32_t self_trigger_mask = 0x0; // disable all channels
00420       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00421         {
00422           if ( S_V1724_ODB[iboard].ch[ichan].self_trigger_mode == CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_DISABLED ) 
00423             self_trigger_mask |= (1 << ichan); // enable channel ichannel
00424         }
00425       printf("self-trigger DISABLED mask: 0x%08x\n",channel_mask);
00426       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_ONLY, self_trigger_mask); 
00427       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00428         {
00429           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetCahnngelSelfTrigger. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00430           return FE_ERR_HW;
00431         }
00432 
00433       // CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_ONLY
00434       self_trigger_mask = 0x0; // disable all channels
00435       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00436         {
00437           if ( S_V1724_ODB[iboard].ch[ichan].self_trigger_mode == CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_ONLY ) 
00438             self_trigger_mask |= (1 << ichan); // enable channel ichannel
00439         }
00440       printf("self-trigger ACQ_ONLY mask: 0x%08x\n",channel_mask);
00441       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_ONLY, self_trigger_mask); 
00442       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00443         {
00444           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetCahnngelSelfTrigger. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00445           return FE_ERR_HW;
00446         }
00447 
00448 
00449       // CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_EXTOUT_ONLY
00450       self_trigger_mask = 0x0; // disable all channels
00451       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00452         {
00453           if ( S_V1724_ODB[iboard].ch[ichan].self_trigger_mode == CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_EXTOUT_ONLY ) 
00454             self_trigger_mask |= (1 << ichan); // enable channel ichannel
00455         }
00456       printf("self-trigger EXTOUT_ONLY mask: 0x%08x\n",channel_mask);
00457       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_EXTOUT_ONLY, self_trigger_mask); 
00458       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00459         {
00460           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetCahnngelSelfTrigger. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00461           return FE_ERR_HW;
00462         }
00463 
00464       
00465       // CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_AND_EXTOUT
00466       self_trigger_mask = 0x0; // disable all channels
00467       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00468         {
00469           if ( S_V1724_ODB[iboard].ch[ichan].self_trigger_mode == CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_AND_EXTOUT ) 
00470             self_trigger_mask |= (1 << ichan); // enable channel ichannel
00471         }
00472       printf("self-trigger ACQ_AND_EXTOUT mask: 0x%08x\n",channel_mask);
00473       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelSelfTrigger(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_TRGMODE_ACQ_AND_EXTOUT, self_trigger_mask); 
00474       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00475         {
00476           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetCahnngelSelfTrigger. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00477           return FE_ERR_HW;
00478         }
00479 
00480 
00481       // =====================================================================================
00482       // Trigger polarity
00483       // =====================================================================================
00484       int trigger_edge = S_V1724_ODB[iboard].trigger_edge;
00485       if ( trigger_edge == 0 )
00486         ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity (handle[iboard], 0, CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnRisingEdge);
00487       else
00488         ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity (handle[iboard], 0, CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00489       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00490         {
00491           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetTriggerPolarity. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00492           return FE_ERR_HW;
00493         }
00494 
00495       // =====================================================================================
00496       // Trigger threshold
00497       // =====================================================================================
00498       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00499         { 
00500           ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelTriggerThreshold(handle[iboard], ichan, S_V1724_ODB[iboard].ch[ichan].trigger_threshold);
00501           if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00502             {
00503               cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetChannelTriggerThreshold. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00504               return FE_ERR_HW;
00505             }
00506         }
00507  
00508 #if 0
00509       // =====================================================================================
00510       // Number of samples over threshold for trigger generation
00511       // =====================================================================================
00512       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00513         {
00514           uint32_t addr = V1724_BASE[iboard]+0x1084 + 0x100*ichan;
00515           CAEN_DGTZ_WriteRegister(handle[iboard], addr, 1);
00516           if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00517             {
00518               cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot Set the number of samples over threshold for trigger. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00519               return FE_ERR_HW;
00520             }
00521         }
00522 #endif 
00523 
00524 #if 1
00525       // =====================================================================================
00526       // Set post-trigger size
00527       // =====================================================================================

00529       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00530         {
00531           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetPostTriggerSize. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00532           return FE_ERR_HW;
00533         }
00534 #endif
00535 
00536       // =====================================================================================
00537       // DC offset
00538       // =====================================================================================
00539       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00540         {
00541           ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelDCOffset(handle[iboard], ichan, S_V1724_ODB[iboard].ch[ichan].offset);
00542           if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00543             {
00544               cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetChannelDCOffset. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00545               return FE_ERR_HW;
00546             }
00547         }
00548 
00549 #if 0      
00550       // =====================================================================================
00551       // Pulse polarity
00552       // =====================================================================================
00553       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00554         {
00555           //ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelPulsePolarity(handle[iboard], ichan, CAEN_DGTZ_PulsePolarityPositive);
00556           //ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelPulsePolarity(handle[iboard], ichan, CAEN_DGTZ_PulsePolarityNegative);
00557           ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelPulsePolarity(handle[iboard], ichan, (CAEN_DGTZ_PulsePolarity_t)S_V1724_ODB[iboard].ch[ichan].polarity);
00558           if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00559             {
00560               cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetChannelPulsePolarity. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00561               return FE_ERR_HW;
00562             }
00563         }
00564 #endif
00565       
00566 #if 0
00567       // =====================================================================================
00568       // Set Zero suppresion parameters
00569       // =====================================================================================
00570       for (uint32_t ichan=0; ichan<8; ichan++)
00571         {
00572           ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetChannelZSParams(handle[iboard], ichan, CAEN_DGTZ_ZS_FINE, 20, 4);
00573           if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00574             {
00575               cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetChannelZSParams. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00576               return FE_ERR_HW;
00577             }
00578         }
00579 
00580 
00581       // =====================================================================================
00582       // Zero suppresion mode
00583       // =====================================================================================
00584       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetZeroSuppressionMode(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_ZS_ZLE);  
00585       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00586         {
00587           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot SetZeroSuppressionMode. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00588           return FE_ERR_HW;
00589         }
00590 #endif
00591 
00592       // =====================================================================================
00593       // Clear digitizer data buffers
00594       // =====================================================================================
00595       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ClearData( handle[iboard] );
00596       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00597         {
00598           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot clear CAEN data buffers. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00599           return FE_ERR_HW;
00600         }
00601 
00602       // =====================================================================================
00603       // Enable acquisition
00604       // =====================================================================================
00605       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SWStartAcquisition(handle[iboard]);
00606       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00607         {
00608           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot CAEN_DGTZ_SWStartAcquisition. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00609           return FE_ERR_HW;
00610         }
00611 
00612       data_size[iboard] = 0;
00613 
00614 
00615       // ======================================================================================
00616       // Channel configuration through register 0x8000=CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD
00617       // ======================================================================================
00618       uint32_t data;
00619       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD, &data);
00620       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00621         {
00622           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot read from register 0x8000. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00623           return FE_ERR_HW;
00624         }
00625       
00626       // enable trigger overlap
00627       data |= (1<<1);
00628       printf("channel configuration register 0x8000: %0x08x\n",data);
00629       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_WriteRegister(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD, data);
00630       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00631         {
00632           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot write to register 0x8000. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00633           return FE_ERR_HW;
00634         }
00635 
00636     }
00637 
00638   return SUCCESS;
00639 }
00640 
00641 INT v1724_eor()
00642 {
00643 
00644   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;
00645   for (int iboard=0; iboard<NBOARDS; iboard++)
00646     { 
00647 
00648       if ( !S_V1724_ODB[iboard].enabled ) continue;
00649 
00650       // =====================================================================================
00651       // Disable acquisition
00652       // =====================================================================================
00653       ret =  CAEN_DGTZ_SWStopAcquisition(handle[iboard]);
00654       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00655         {
00656           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_init","Cannot CAEN_DGTZ_SWStopAcquisition. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00657         }
00658     }
00659 
00660   return SUCCESS;
00661 }
00662 
00663 INT v1724_read(char *pevent)
00664 {
00665   printf("Read out data from digitizer(s)\n");
00666 
00667   // =====================================================================================
00668   // Read out remaining data from the digitizer
00669   // =====================================================================================
00670   v1724_readout();
00671 
00672   // =====================================================================================
00673   // Fill MIDAS event
00674   // =====================================================================================
00675   bk_init32(pevent);
00676   char bk_name[80];
00677   char *pdata;
00678   for (int iboard=0; iboard<NBOARDS; iboard++)
00679     {
00680 
00681       if ( !S_V1724_ODB[iboard].enabled ) continue;
00682 
00683       sprintf(bk_name, "CDG%i", iboard);
00684       bk_create(pevent, bk_name, TID_BYTE, &pdata);
00685       if ( data_size[iboard] > MAX_EVENT_SIZE/2 )
00686         {
00687           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_read","Event size is too large. Truncating data...\n");
00688           data_size[iboard] = MAX_EVENT_SIZE/2;
00689         }
00690       memcpy(pdata, data_buffer[iboard], data_size[iboard]);
00691       pdata += data_size[iboard];
00692       bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00693       //printf("board %i data size: %i\n",iboard,data_size[iboard]);
00694       // reset data couner for the next event
00695       data_size[iboard] = 0;
00696     }
00697 
00698   return SUCCESS;
00699 }
00700 
00701 void v1724_readout()
00702 {
00703 
00704   CAEN_DGTZ_ErrorCode ret;  
00705   for (int iboard=0; iboard<NBOARDS; iboard++)
00706     {
00707       if ( !S_V1724_ODB[iboard].enabled ) continue;
00708 
00709       uint32_t rdata;
00710       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle[iboard], 0x812C, &rdata);
00711       //printf("Event Stored: 0x%08x ret = %i\n",rdata, ret);
00712       if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00713         {
00714           cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_readout","Cannot read register 0x812C. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00715         }
00716       
00717       //ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle[iboard], 0x814C, &rdata);
00718       //printf("Event size: 0x%08x ret = %i\n",rdata, ret);
00719 
00720       if ( rdata > 0 )
00721         {
00722           // =====================================================================================
00723           // Read data
00724           // =====================================================================================
00725           uint32_t caen_data_size;
00726           ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadData(handle[iboard], CAEN_DGTZ_SLAVE_TERMINATED_READOUT_MBLT, caen_data_buffer[iboard], &caen_data_size);
00727           if ( ret != CAEN_DGTZ_Success )
00728             {
00729               cm_msg(MERROR,"v1724_readout","Cannot DGTZ_ReadData. Error 0x%08x\n",ret);
00730             }
00731           //printf("data size: %i\n", caen_data_size);
00732 
00733 #if 0
00734           uint32_t numEvents;
00735           CAEN_DGTZ_GetNumEvents(handle[iboard],caen_data_buffer[iboard],caen_data_size,&numEvents);
00736           printf("numEvents: %i\n", numEvents);
00737 #endif 
00738           
00739           if ( data_size[iboard] + caen_data_size < data_buffer_size[iboard] )
00740             {
00741               memcpy( (data_buffer[iboard] + data_size[iboard]), caen_data_buffer[iboard], caen_data_size);
00742               data_size[iboard] += caen_data_size;
00743             }
00744         }
00745     }
00746   
00747 }
00748 
00749 INT v1724_poll_live()
00750 {
00751 
00752   v1724_readout();
00753 
00754   return SUCCESS;
00755 }
